731749f-a.title: Fires, accidents and tragedies - [Building nearly destroyed by fire.]
731749f-a.text:
FIRES, ACCIDENTS AND TRAGEDIES

164 Attorney Street, east side, between Stanton and Houston Streets, showing building nearly destroyed by fire.

September 4, 1904.

Gift of Gustav Scholer, M. D.

731747f-a.title: Fires, accidents and tragedies - [Building nearly destroyed by fire.]
731747f-a.text:
FIRES, ACCIDENTS AND TRAGEDIES

164 Attorney Street, east side, between Stanton and Houston Streets, showing building nearly destroyed by fire. Fourteen lives were lost in this conflagration.

September 4, 1904.

Gift of Gustav Scholer, M. D.

For an additional view of this location, see the regular files.
